channel.title: Menu bar help

item.title: Menu bar help
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Well I am trying to add a menu bar to my client, but the menus donâ€™t load correctly. It only shows the top part of the first menu item. I have tried making the login screen and stuff load before the menu bar, but all that resulted in was the menu loading, but not the game part. Here is my code where all that is loaded.

Picture:

[code] private void startGame()
{
try
{
JFrame.setDefaultLookAndFeelDecorated(true);
sign.signlink.mainapp = this;

		frame = new JFrame("");
		frame.setLayout(new BorderLayout());

		frame.setResizable(false);
		frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
		game = new JPanel();
		game.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
		game.add(this);
		game.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(765, 503));
		JMenuBar menuBar = new JMenuBar();
		menu = new JMenu("File");
		menuBar.add(menu);
		item = new JMenuItem("Settings");
		menu.add(item);
		menu = new JMenu("Help");
		menuBar.add(menu);
		frame.getContentPane().add(menuBar, BorderLayout.NORTH);
		frame.getContentPane().add(game, BorderLayout.CENTER);
		frame.pack();
		frame.setVisible(true);
		init();
	}
	catch (Exception e)
	{
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
}[/code]

All help will be appreciated.
